summary: Safety
title: Safety
body:
First on my SanSan drabbles/short stories series.
Prompt: “I need a place to stay.”
Rating: T for mentions of abuse.
Summary: “Hello Sandor,” her voice was raspy. “I’m sorry if I’m bothering you, but… I need a place to stay. Only a few days, but you can say no if you don’t want to.” Her voice went from raspy to panicked.
Words: 438
TW: Mentions of abuse.

Series | List of Prompts | Read @ AO3

Sandor was about to have dinner when he heard a knock on his door, immediately follow by barks from Stranger. Sandor knew his dog, he recognized that the barking wasn’t in warning, Stranger sounded excited So he left his dinner and went to see who had come over so late.

He crossed his living room and shooed Stranger away. When he opened his door, he was surprised to see Sansa Stark of all people on the other side, hand raised to knock again. He looked at her and felt rage bubbling in his chest, Sansa’s eyes were watery, a red and angry mark on her cheek and she looked lost.

“Hello Sandor,” her voice was raspy. “I’m sorry if I’m bothering you, but… I need a place to stay. Only a few days, but you can say no if you don’t want to.” Her voice went from raspy to panicked.

He placed his hands on her shoulders, as gently as he could, “The bloody bastard did this, didn’t he?”

She didn’t say anything, but looked down at her feet. It was all the answer he needed. “He had Meryn Trant hit me,” her voice was barely above a whisper.

Again, rage rose like bile in his stomach and throat, so he did his best to keep his voice calm, “Come in Little bird.”

She tried to give him a smile but it was more a grimace, she then picked the bag at her feet and followed him inside, patting Stranger’s head as she passed him by. “Thank you Sandor, I won’t be a bother, I promise.”

“I know you won’t,” he sighed. “You’re the most polite person I know, you don’t have it in you to be a bother. Leave your things there, come, let us get you some ice for that.”

Sansa placed her bag on the sofa and followed Sandor into the kitchen, sitting down at the table as Sandor reached into his freezer to get a ice. He put some ice cubes in a bag and wrapped it in a kitchen towel, “Here, put this on your cheek.”

She did as told, “I found out he was cheating, with Margaery Tyrell. She was always so nice to me, I guess it was all lies. Arya’s out of town and can’t go to Robb’s place…” she confessed. “At least, not like this.”

“No, your brothers would kill him,” he said as he sat down next to her. “You can stay, as long as you need.”

She gave him a half a smile, reached for his hand and said, “Thank you Sandor, you are a great friend.”

summary:
dark!Daenerys x dark!Sansa AU:
The dragon queen smiles. Wicked. Wild.
"Would that make you happy?" she cups Sansa's face with...
body:
dark!Daenerys x dark!Sansa AU:

The dragon queen smiles. Wicked. Wild.

“Would that make you happy?” she cups Sansa’s face with both her hands “Will you smile for me, when i burn those who hurt you alive?”

Her heart beats fast as she looks into Daenerys violet eyes “Yes”.

summary: «if sansa hadn’t told tyrion, dany would’ve not snapped. it’s her fault all of that happened.» can you believe I just read this...
question: «if sansa hadn’t told tyrion, dany would’ve not snapped. it’s her fault all of that happened.» can you believe I just read this with my own two eyes? what would you say to those who believe this?
answer: I can lmao. They’ve been blaming Varys too. Dany has been willing to destroy cities for years, she wanted to do it in season 7 and she was perfectly willing to do it in 8x04. Her advisors would always disagree with Dany regardless of what Sansa told them because anyone would. Sansa could have been dead for seasons and chances are Dany would have massacred innocent people anyway. I know this because I watched her burn soldiers for an uncomfortably long time

reblog.comment: I can lmao. They’ve been blaming Varys too. Dany has been willing to destroy cities for years, she wanted to do it in season 7 and she was perfectly willing to do it in 8x04. Her advisors would always disagree with Dany regardless of what Sansa told them because anyone would. Sansa could have been dead for seasons and chances are Dany would have massacred innocent people anyway. I know this because I watched her burn soldiers for an uncomfortably long time

Her advisors would always disagree with Dany regardless of what Sansa told them because anyone would. Sansa could have been dead for seasons and chances are Dany would have massacred innocent people anyway. I know this because I watched her burn soldiers for an uncomfortably long time

summary: i’m glad there was an interaction between sansa and sandor but when she said that without everything that happened to her, she...
body: i’m glad there was an interaction between sansa and sandor but when she said that without everything that happened to her, she would have stayed a little bird, idk i know she’s saying she had to grow strong and she’s glad that she’s strong now i guess, but it sounds like she’s thankful for the people that used and hurt her. idk that sentiment could have been worded differently

summary:
Nothing is more boring to me than pitting Dany and Sansa against each other.
It was boring on the show. It's boring when fans do...
body:
Nothing is more boring to me than pitting Dany and Sansa against each other.

It was boring on the show. It’s boring when fans do it. There’s literally so many other things to use your brain on.

summary: Sansa doesn’t want Jon out of Winterfell
title: Sansa doesn’t want Jon out of Winterfell
body:
If we think about the leaks, Sansa hearing that Jon went to live in Castle Black because he feels guilty about killing Daenerys (which is something that will probably draw a smile on her face)  and she’s just “Ok” and goes on to rule the North alone, doesn’t make sense at all.

I’d expect her to go to Castle Black to try convincing him to go back to Winterfell

I hope the leaks are missing something.

reblog.comment:
